name: Hyper Hexagon (TheCocce)
description:
Hexagonal board game challenge - A classical and futuristic experience.

Play with another player or versus Artificial Intelligence.

  • 11 different board
  • Player vs Player
  • Player vs CPU
  • CPU vs CPU
  • 6 different CPU AI
    • Very basic random AI
    • High score based implementation AI using Ataxx algorithm
    • 4 Heuristic MinMax algorithm (the strongest is very difficult)
  • Undo feature to practice and learn vs CPU
  • Configurable CPU delay

Inspired by the old classic Hexxagon '90s game.

Flutter and Flame-engine is used.

Music by DaveJf - https://freesound.org/people/DaveJf/sounds/634642/
Sound generated using SFXR.
